highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (23), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (16), Sonia Marmeladov (15), Katerina Ivanovna (14)
story_summary: Raskolnikov confronts Svidrigailov, expressing his suspicions about Svidrigailov's intentions towards his sister, Dounia. Svidrigailov, maintaining a playful demeanor, reveals that Dounia is not at home and invites Raskolnikov to his lodgings. Meanwhile, Dounia encounters Svidrigailov and reluctantly agrees to speak with him, despite her apprehensions. Their interaction hints at underlying tensions and secrets regarding Raskolnikov.
